verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I'm free; hallelujah, I'm free!
No burden of sin is bothering me;
For Jesus came, and He took my place
On Calvary, praise God,
Hallelujah, I'm free!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah we're one, hallelujah we're one,
Glorifying the Father, magnifying the Son;
It's Christ in us and we in Him,
Till perfection's done, praise God,
Hallelujah we're one!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah I see, hallelujah I see,
A spiritual man in the midst of thee;
From the dead He comes to raise up sons
And set men free, praise God,
Hallelujah I see.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hallelujah I hear, hallelujah I hear
A trumpet sounding all around here;
It's the word of God coming forth in truth,
Hallelujah I hear, praise God,
Hallelujah I hear.
